form.label: Time lag By Sourcetype
form.description: Runs a search to show the difference between the time an event occurred (according to the timestamp of the event) and the time Splunk indexed the event.

input.populatingSearch: | metadata type=sourcetypes index=* | fields sourcetype | sort sourcetype

table.searchString: index=* sourcetype=$sourcetype$ | eval timediff=_indextime - _time | stats count AS "Event Count" max(timediff) AS "Largest Time Difference" min(timediff) AS "Smallest Time Difference" avg(timediff) AS Average_Time_Difference by host | eval "Time Difference (Minutes)" = Average_Time_Difference/60 | rename Average_Time_Difference AS "Average Time Difference (Seconds)"
